GSP29udnyku2u:6: na cādṛṣṭena vyavahāraḥ- tato lokottaraḥ sarvānubhāvī sambhāvyate /
GSP29udnyku2u:11: [ku.2.203] tathā hi...pramājñānahetvatiriktahetvadhīnā kāryatve sati tadviśeṣatvāt apramāvat /
GSP29udnyku2u:16: [ku.2.204] jñānatve 'pyatiriktadoṣānupraveśādaprameti cet- evaṃ tarhi doṣābhāvamadhikamāsādya pramāpi jāyeta;
GSP29udnyku2u:23: tatastadabhāvo bhāva eveti kathaṃ sa neṣyate?
GSP29udnyku2u:24: [ku.2.205] syādetat- śabde tāvat vipralipsādayo bhāvā eva doṣāḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:25: tatastadabhāve svata eva śābdī prameti cet- na- anumānādau liṅgaviparyāsādīnāṃ (74)
GSP29udnyku2u:28: śabde tu vipralipsādyabhāve vaktṛguṇāpekṣā nāstī'ti cenna- guṇābhāve tadapramāṇyasya vaktṛdoṣāpekṣā nāstīti viparyayasyāpi (75)tulyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:29: aprāmāṇyaṃ prati doṣāṇāmanvayavyatirekau sta iti cenna- prāmāṇyaṃ pratyapi guṇānāṃ tayoḥ sattvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:31: apauruṣeye tu doṣanivṛttyaiva prāmāṇyamiti cenna- guṇanivṛttyāprāmāṇyasyāpi sambhavāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:32: tasyā aprāmāṇyaṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ nopalabdhamiti cet- doṣanivṛtteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ prati kva sāmarthyamupalabdham?
GSP29udnyku2u:36: guṇānāṃ doṣotsāraṇaprayuktaḥ sannidhiriti cet- doṣāṇāmapi guṇotsāraṇaprayukta ityastu /
GSP29udnyku2u:41: pravṛttiprayatnastu satyapi rāgānuvidhāne dveṣābhāvahetuka iti vibhago yujyate;
GSP29udnyku2u:43: [ku.2.207] tathāpi vedānāmapauruṣeyatve siddhe apetavaktṛdoṣatvādeva prāmāṇyaṃ setsyati /
GSP29udnyku2u:44: tataḥ siddhe prāmāṇye guṇābhāve 'pi taditi doṣābhāva eva hetuḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:45: akāraṇaṃ guṇā iti cenna- apetavaktṛguṇatvena satpratipakṣatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:51: tasyāḥ kevalāyā aprāmāṇyaṃ pratyanaṅgatvānna śaṅketi cet- doṣanivṛtterapi kevalāyāḥ prāmāṇyaṃpratyanaṅgatvānna tayā śaṅkānivṛttiriti tulyamiti
GSP29udnyku2u:52: [ku.2.208] evaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ parato jñāyate anabhyāsadaśāyāṃ sāṃśayikatvāt aprāmāṇyavat /
GSP29udnyku2u:59: [ku.2.209] atha pramāṇavadapramāṇe 'pi tatpratyayadarśanāt viśeṣādarśanāt bhavati śaṅketyabhiprāyaḥ- tat kiṃ pramāṇajñānopalambhe 'pi na tatprāmāṇyamupalabdham,
GSP29udnyku2u:65: [ku.2.210] yadapi jhaṭiti pracuratarasamarthapravṛttyanyathānupapattyā svataḥ prāmāṇyamucyate- tadapi nāsti;
GSP29udnyku2u:75: upayoge vā svata eveti kuta etat?
GSP29udnyku2u:76: tataḥ samarthapravṛttiprācuryamapi prāmāṇyaprācuryāttadgrahaṇaprācuryādvā svatastvaṃ tu tasya kvopayujyate /
GSP29udnyku2u:77: na hi pipāsūnāṃ jhaṭiti pracurā samarthā ca pravṛttirambhasīti pipāsopaśamanaśaktistasya pratyakṣā syāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:79: sa ca svato yadi na syāt,
GSP29udnyku2u:80: na syādeva; parataḥpakṣasyānavasthāduḥsthatvāditi- cet- na- tadagrahe 'pyarthasandehādapi sarvasyopapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:85: tatastanniścayārthamavaśyaṃ liṅgāntarāpekṣāyāmanavastheti cet- tatkimanupapadyamānor'thaḥ aniścita eva svopapādakamākṣipati;
GSP29udnyku2u:87: pratyakṣeṇa tasya niścayāttasya ca sattayaiva niścāyakatvānnaivamiti cet- mamāpi pratyakṣeṇa liṅganiścayāt tasya ca sattayaiva niścāyakatvānnaivamiti tulyam /
GSP29udnyku2u:89: yaḥsyāditi cet- anupapadyamānārthajñānaprāmāṇyāniścaye kathaṃ tanniścaya iti tulyam /
GSP29udnyku2u:90: na hi niścayena svaprāmāṇyaniścayena vā viṣayaṃ niścāyayati pratyakṣam;
GSP29udnyku2u:93: tadā kā vārteti cet- anupapadyamāno 'pyartho yadyābhāsaḥ syāt,
GSP29udnyku2u:96: sa ca kvacidvādhakenāpodyata iti cet- liṅge 'pyevamiti tulyam /
GSP29udnyku2u:97: tarhi prāmāṇyānumāne'pi śaṅkā tadavasthaiveti niṣphalaḥ prayāsa iti cet- etadapi tādṛgeva /
GSP29udnyku2u:98: anupapadyamānor'tha evāsau tathāvidhaḥ kaścit yaḥ svapne 'pi nābhāsaḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:99: tato nā'śaṅketi cet- liṅge 'pyevamiti samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:104: anyathā hi tathābhūtasyāpi vyabhicāre sāpi na syāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:105: mā bhūditi cenna- bhavitavyaṃ hi tattvātatvavibhāgena (tattvātattvavyavasthā)
GSP29udnyku2u:133: [ku.2.218] yattvekadeśino naivamicchanti tān pratyucyate- vivādādhyāsitaḥ śabdapradhvaṃsa indriyagrāhyaḥ aindriyikābhāvatvāt ghaṭābhāvavat /
GSP29udnyku2u:148: tathā viśeṣyamavyavasthāpayataśca kathaṃ viśeṣaṇatvamiti cet- na;
GSP29udnyku2u:158: [ku.2.220] tathāpi tayā tathaiva pratītiḥ kartavyeti cenna- gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣyatvāva(ṣyāva)
GSP29udnyku2u:160: anyathā saṃyuktasamavāyena rūpādau viśiṣṭavikalpadhījananadarśanāt gandhādāvapi tathātvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:163: sā cāto nivartata iti cenna- asya pratibandhasyendriyasannikṛṣṭārthapratisambandhiviṣayatvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:171: dṛśyādhāratvaṃ dṛśyapratiyogitāceti dvayamapyasya yogyateti cenna- ubhayanirūpaṇīyatvaniyamānabhyupagamāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:173: [ku.2.223] anyathā “iha bhūtale ghaṭo nāstī'tyeṣāpi pratītiḥ pratyakṣā na syāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:192: prakṛte tu na pratiyoginirūpaṇārthaṃ tadupayogaḥ tasya saṃyogavat ādhārānirūpyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:204: [ku.2.226] ahamidānīṃ niḥśabdaśrotravān śabdopalabdhirahitatvāt badhiravaditi cet-na-dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatvāt,
GSP29udnyku2u:207: tasyāpi ca śravaso niḥśabdatve pramāṇaṃ nāsti /
GSP29udnyku2u:215: tathā sati karṇaśaṣkulyavacchedotpāda eva nabhasastaṃ prati nivarteta;
GSP29udnyku2u:231: tena teṣu vidhīyamānaḥ śabdaḥ ākāśa eva vihito bhavati;
GSP29udnyku2u:233: śarīre sukhādivat iti cet na- tatra sopādhāvātmani pratyakṣasiddhe sukhādiniṣedhasyāpi pratyakṣāsiddhatvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:247: [ku.2.229] api ca naṣṭāśrayāṇāṃ dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ nāśopalambhaḥ katham?
GSP29udnyku2u:248: na kathañciditi cet- āśrayanāśātkāryanāśa iti kuta etat?
GSP29udnyku2u:254: yogyasya tathānupalabhyamānatve sati upalabhyamānatvāditi cet-na-tantvavayavānāṃ paṭānādhāratve sādhye siddhasādhanāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:257: tadabhāvavanta ete aṃśavaḥ iti sādhyamiti cenna- tantunāśottarakāle paṭanāśāttadvattānupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:260: [ku.2.232] ananyagatikatayā viśiṣṭaniṣedhe kṛte viśeṣaṇānāmapyabhāvaḥ pratīto bhavati;
GSP29udnyku2u:261: guṇakriyāvatpaṭādhārāstantavo na santi svāvayaveṣviti hi pratyaya iti cet- tathāpi guṇakarmaṇāṃ paṭasya ca pradhvaṃsaḥ kimadhikaraṇaḥ pratīyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP29udnyku2u:264: āśrayāvacchedakatayā teṣāmapyadūraviprakarṣeṇa taddeśatvam evaṃbhūtenāpi deśena tannirūpaṇam;
GSP29udnyku2u:265: yogyatāyā avyabhicārāditi cet- na tarhi pratiyogisamavāyideśenaiva pradhvaṃsanirūpaṇamiti niyamaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:268: taṃ vihāya tasyāṃ satyāṃ tadabhāvo yatra kvacinnirūpyo deśe kāle vā /
GSP29udnyku2u:295: tena nimittādināpi deśena pradhvaṃso nirūpyate ityakāmenāpi svīkaraṇīyam;
GSP29udnyku2u:303: [ku.2.238] naivam; abādhitasya tasya svataḥ pramāṇatvāditi cet- tulyam /
GSP29udnyku2u:311: [ku.2.239] tadiha na svābhāvikamiti cenna- svābhāvikatvāvadhāraṇanyāyasya tatra tatra siddhasyātrāpi tulyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:322: nīlaḥ paṭa ityapi tathā syāt; aviśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:323: na; pītatvādīnāmanyadharmatvasthitau śaṅkhādīnāṃ ca tadviruddhadharmatve sthite,
GSP29udnyku2u:336: sparśādyanantarbhāveṇa bhāveṣu tvagādīnāmavyāpārāt na ca śravaṇenaiva tadgrahaṇam;
GSP29udnyku2u:338: tāra-tārataratvādayo vā na vāyudharmāḥ śrāvaṇatvāt kādivat /
GSP29udnyku2u:348: tathā ca taddharmagrahaṇaṃ śravasopapatsyata iti cenna- tārastārataro vāyaṃ gakāra ityatra dhvanīnāmasphuraṇāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:349: na ca vyaktyā vinā sāmānyasphuraṇaṃ kāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:356: akāraṇaṃ vyaktiyogyateti cet- evaṃ tarhi sattādravyatvapārthivatvādīnāṃ svarūpayogyatve paramāṇvādiṣvapi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:359: [ku.2.243] tathā ca na tāratvādīnāmāropasambhava iti svābhāvikatvasthitau viruddhadharmādhyāsena bhedasya pāramārthikatvātpratyabhijñānamapramāṇamiti na tena bādhaḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:363: avaikalye, tvādīyenaiva vikalena bhavitavyamiti hīnasya na satpratipakṣatvam /
GSP29udnyku2u:366: [ku.2.245] dravyaṃ śabdaḥ sākṣātsambandhena gṛhyamāṇatvādghaṭavaditi siddhyatīti cenna- etasyāpyasiddheḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:367: na hi śrotraguṇatve dravyatve vāsiddhe sākṣātsambandhe śabdasya pramāṇamasti /
GSP29udnyku2u:369: tathā hi- sadādyabhedena sāmānyāditrayavyāvṛttau mūrtadravyasamavāyaniṣedhena karmatvaniṣedhāt
GSP29udnyku2u:370: dravyaguṇatvapariśeṣe saṃyogasamavāyayoranyataraḥ sambandhaḥ” iti cenna- bādhakabalena
GSP29udnyku2u:372: bādhake satyapi vā dravyatvāpratiṣedhe karmatvādīnāmapyapratiṣedhaprasaktau paraśeṣāsiddheḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:389: śrotraṃ vā na svavaguṇagrāhakam indriyatvāt ghrāṇavat iti na guṇatvasiddhiriticet- tataḥ kim?
GSP29udnyku2u:395: ātmā vā na tadgrāhakaḥ tadāśrayatvāt gandhādyāśrayaghaṭādivadityādyapi śaṅkyeta /
GSP29udnyku2u:396: tasmāt svaguṇaḥ paraguṇe vāyogyo na gṛhyate;
GSP29udnyku2u:399: [ku.2.248] avaśyaṃ ca śrotreṇa viśeṣaguṇagrāhiṇā bhavitavyam indriyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:405: anyathā cāndramasaṃ tejaḥ svarūpeṇa yogyamiti tadapyupalabhyeta;
GSP29udnyku2u:406: ātmā vā mano grāhya iti suṣuptyavasthāyāmapyupalabhyeta;
GSP29udnyku2u:429: akāraṇakā hi nityāḥ prakarṣavanta eva bhavanti,
GSP29udnyku2u:435: ca bhavantī jāyamānatāmādāyaiva viśrāmyatīti pratibandhasiddhau prayujyate- śabdo jāyate,
GSP29udnyku2u:437: anyathā niyāmakamantareṇa bhavantī nityeṣvapi sā syāt (bhavatīti nitye 'pi syāt)
GSP29udnyku2u:439: śabdādanyatreyaṃ gatiriti cenna- sādhyadharmiṇaṃ vihāyeti pratyavasthānasya sarvānumānasulabhatvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:452: idaṃ hyutpattimattvaṃ vināśakāraṇasannidhiviruddhebhyo nityebhyaḥ svavyāpakanivṛttau nivartamānaṃ vināśakasannidhimati vināśini viśrāmyatīti
GSP29udnyku2u:453: “vināśakāraṇasannidhānenāvaśyaṃ jāyamānasya bhavitavyamiti kuto nirṇīta'miti cet- na tadasannidhānaṃ hi na tāvadākāśāderiva svabhāvavirodhāt;
GSP29udnyku2u:462: tathā yadi kuṅkumasamāgamaṃ vinā na vināśaḥ paṭasyeti syāt,
GSP29udnyku2u:465: sa (106)cāto nivartamānaḥ svavyāpyamupādāya nivartata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:471: ākṣepata iti cet- kaḥ khalvayamākṣepo nāma?
GSP29udnyku2u:475: saṅgaterapi tathaiva sugrahatvāt vyaktimātrarūpeṇāvinābhāva” iti cenna- vyaktitvasya sāmānyasyābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:480: [ku.2.254] arthāpattirākṣepa iti cenna- vyaktyā[ktiṃ] vinā kimanupapannam?
GSP29udnyku2u:490: [ku.2.255] syādetat- pratibandhaṃ vināpi pakṣadharmatābalāt yathā liṅgaṃ viśeṣe paryavasyati,
GSP29udnyku2u:491: tathā saṅgatiṃ vināpi śabdaḥ śaktiviśeṣādviśeṣe paryavasyati /
GSP29udnyku2u:492: sa evā'kṣepa ityucyate iti cet- na tāvat pratītiḥ krameṇa;
GSP29udnyku2u:494: jātipratyāyanamapekṣata iti cet- kṛtaṃ tarhi śabdaśaktika(ktibhedaka)
GSP29udnyku2u:500: [ku.2.256] evaṃ ca yathā sāmānyaviṣayā śaktirekaiva tadvati paryavasyati,
GSP29udnyku2u:502: na ca nityā api varṇāḥ svarānupūrvyādihīnāḥ padārthaiḥ saṅgamyante /
GSP29udnyku2u:504: tasmāttattajjātīyakroḍaniviṣṭā eva padārthāḥ padāni ca sambadhyante,
GSP29udnyku2u:507: [ku.2.257] yadā ca varṇā eva na nityāḥ,
GSP29udnyku2u:513: paramparādhīnatayā pravāhāvicchedameva nityatāṃ brūma iti cet- etadapi nāsti;
GSP29udnyku2u:521: disampradāyabhaṅgaprasaṅgācca kathamevamiti cet- [ku.2.259] ucyate- varṣādivad bhavopādhiḥ vṛttirodhaḥ suṣuptivat /
GSP29udnyku2u:529: tvāttasya, tadabhāva eva vyāvṛttau ko doṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:533: na hi-“aniyatavipākasamayāni karmāṇī'ti tadānīṃ kṛtsnānyeva bhogā(111)vimukhāni /
GSP29udnyku2u:545: na tu viśvasyeti cet- anantatayā aniyatavipākasamayatayā upamardyepamardakasvabhāvatayā ca karmaṇām,
GSP29udnyku2u:550: krameṇa, na tu yugapaditi cenna- kāraṇakramāyattatvātkāryakramasya /
GSP29udnyku2u:551: na ca svahetubalāyātaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ krameṇaiva bhavitavyam;
GSP29udnyku2u:556: yathā hi vātapittaśleṣmaṇāṃ cayaprakopapraśamakramāniyame 'pi ekadā sannipātaḥ syāt,
GSP29udnyku2u:558: tathā kālānalapavanamahārṇavānāṃ sannipāte brahmāṇḍadehapralayāvasthāyāṃ yugapadeva bhogarahitāścetanāḥsyuriti ko virodhaḥ? /
GSP29udnyku2u:559: tathāpi videhāḥ karmiṇa iti durghaṭamiti cet- kimatra durghaṭam;
GSP29udnyku2u:571: sa eva hetuḥ sarvatrānugata iti sarveṣāṃ tatsāntānikānāṃ samānajātīyatvamiti kimasaṅgatam /
GSP29udnyku2u:575: gomayavṛścikādivadidānīmapi kiṃ[api tathā kiṃ] na syāditi cenna- kālaviśeṣaniyatatvātkāryaviśeṣāṇām /
GSP29udnyku2u:576: na hi varṣāsu gomayācchālūka iti hemante 'pi syā(pi kiṃ na syā)t /
GSP29udnyku2u:584: taddharśī bālo vyutpādyate tathā- ihāpi syāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:586: [ku.2.264] sargādāveva kiṃ pramāṇamiti cet viśvasantāno 'yaṃ dṛśyasantānaśūnyaiḥ samavāyibhirārabdhaḥ santānatvāt āraṇeyasantānavat /
GSP29udnyku2u:587: vartamānabrahmāṇḍaparamāṇavaḥ pūrvamutpāditasajātīyasantānāntarāḥ nityatve sati tadārambhakatvāt pradīpaparamāṇuvadityādi /
GSP29udnyku2u:589: santānāvicchedaśceti ko virodha iti cenna- evaṃ hi (117)
GSP29udnyku2u:606: īdṛśyāṃ ca vastusthitau bhogo 'pi karmabhirevameva vastusvabhāvānatikrameṇa sampādanīya
GSP29udnyku2u:607: iti dvyaṇukavat pipīlikāṇḍāderbrahmāṇḍaparyantasyāpi viśvasyeyameva gatiriti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:608: [ku.2.266] tathā ca brahmāṇḍe paramāṇusādbhavitari paramāṇuṣu ca svatantreṣu pṛthagāsīneṣu tadantaḥpātinaḥ prāṇigaṇāḥ (119)
GSP29udnyku2u:646: so 'pi pādo (128)durāgatādivipādikāśataduḥsthaḥ aśraddhāmalakalaṅkitaḥ kāmakrodhādikaṇṭakaśatajarjaraḥ pratyahamapacīyamānavīryatayā itastataḥ skhalannivopalambhate /
GSP29udnyku2u:647: [ku.2.268] ṭhaidānīmiva sarvatra dṛṣṭānnādhikamiṣyate” iti cenna- smṛtyanuṣṭhānānumitānāṃ śākhānāmucchedadarśanāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:658: na ca dharmavedanatvāt idamevānumānam anumeyo vedaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:664: nityamajñāyamānatvāttat apratyāyakaṃ kathamanumānaṃ kathaṃ ca mūlamiti cet- vedaḥ kimajñāyamānaḥ pratyāyakaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:672: tena tu śabdena kartavyatā pratīyata iti cenna- ācārasvarūpasya pratyakṣasiddhatvena mūlāntarānapekṣaṇāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:680: vyāpteḥ” iti cet- ata eva tarhi tasya pratyakṣānumānamūlatvamanumeyam /
GSP29udnyku2u:686: kiṃ naśchinnamiti cet- prathamaṃ tāva“nnityānumeyo veda'iti;
GSP29udnyku2u:694: evam, punaḥ sa kaścit kālo bhavitā,
GSP29udnyku2u:699: tatastadvadāgamamūlatā iti cet- evaṃ tarhi pravāhādau liṅgābhāve kartavyatvāgamayorananumānāt,
GSP29udnyku2u:703: [ku.2.275] adhunāpyasti sānyatreti cet- atra kathaṃ nāsti?
GSP29udnyku2u:708: sarveṣāmanyatra gamane ucchede vā niyamena bhāratavarṣe śiṣṭācārasyāpyucchedaprasaṅgāt;
GSP29udnyku2u:714: viśvaparigrahācca na sahasā sarvoccheda iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:719: vedā api gatānugatikatayaiva lokaiḥ parigṛhyanta iti,
GSP29udnyku2u:729: tadanantaraṃ ca punaruccheda iti sārasvatamiva srotaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:732: smarati ca bhagavānvyāso gītāsu bhagavadvacanam- “yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānirbhavati bhārata /
GSP29udnyku2u:739: sa hyatra na syāt ṛte nimittam /
GSP29udnyku2u:759: (143)tathā hi, bhūyastatra karmalāghavamiti alasāḥ- itaḥ patitānāmapyanupraveśa iti ananyagatikāḥ- bhakṣyādyaniyama iti rāgiṇaḥ- svecchayā pari(yārthapari)
GSP29udnyku2u:760: graha iti kutarkābhyāsinaḥ- pitrādikramābhāvāt pravṛttiriti pāṣaṇḍasaṃsargiṇaḥ- “ubhayorantaraṃ
GSP29udnyku2u:761: jñātvā kasya śaucaṃ vidhīyate” ityādi śravaṇādavyagratābhimāninaḥ- saptaghaṭikābhojanādisiddherjīviketi
GSP29udnyku2u:769: ato na te mahājanaparigṛgītā iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:772: na kiñcidvinaśyatīti stimitākāśakalpe jagati kuto viśeṣāt punaḥ sargaḥ?
GSP29udnyku2u:781: nityasya ca viṣayataḥ svarūpataścāviśeṣāditi cet- na- [ku.2.282] śarīrasaṅkṣobhaśramajanitanidrāṇāṃ
GSP29udnyku2u:797: ta evaṃ saṃsārāṅgāreṣu pacyamānān prāṇinaḥ paśyantaḥ paramakāruṇikāḥ priyahitopadeśenānugrahīṣyanti;
GSP29udnyku2u:800: tathā hi- atīndriyārthadarśanopāyo māvanetyabhyupagame 'pi nāsau satyameva sākṣātkāramutpādayati;
GSP29udnyku2u:823: pratipanniśīthanidrāṇaprātaḥpratibuddhasamastopādhyāyavat anyonyasaṃvādāt kapilādiṣu samāśvāsa iti cenna- ekajanmapratisandhānavat janmāntarapratisandhāne pramāṇābhavāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:825: na hi pūrvajanmani mātāpitrorbrāhmaṇyāttaduttaratra brāhmaṇyamiti niyamaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:840: astveka eveti cet- na tarhīśvaramantareṇānyatra samāśvāsa iti /
GSP29udnyku2u:874: so 'pi pādo (128)durāgatādivipādikāśataduḥsthaḥ aśraddhāmalakalaṅkitaḥ kāmakrodhādikaṇṭakaśatajarjaraḥ pratyahamapacīyamānavīryatayā itastataḥ skhalannivopalambhate /
GSP29udnyku2u:875: [ku.2.268] ṭhaidānīmiva sarvatra dṛṣṭānnādhikamiṣyate” iti cenna- smṛtyanuṣṭhānānumitānāṃ śākhānāmucchedadarśanāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:886: na ca dharmavedanatvāt idamevānumānam anumeyo vedaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:892: nityamajñāyamānatvāttat apratyāyakaṃ kathamanumānaṃ kathaṃ ca mūlamiti cet- vedaḥ kimajñāyamānaḥ pratyāyakaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:900: tena tu śabdena kartavyatā pratīyata iti cenna- ācārasvarūpasya pratyakṣasiddhatvena mūlāntarānapekṣaṇāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:908: vyāpteḥ” iti cet- ata eva tarhi tasya pratyakṣānumānamūlatvamanumeyam /
GSP29udnyku2u:914: kiṃ naśchinnamiti cet- prathamaṃ tāva“nnityānumeyo veda'iti;
GSP29udnyku2u:922: evam, punaḥ sa kaścit kālo bhavitā,
GSP29udnyku2u:927: tatastadvadāgamamūlatā iti cet- evaṃ tarhi pravāhādau liṅgābhāve kartavyatvāgamayorananumānāt,
GSP29udnyku2u:931: [ku.2.275] adhunāpyasti sānyatreti cet- atra kathaṃ nāsti?
GSP29udnyku2u:936: sarveṣāmanyatra gamane ucchede vā niyamena bhāratavarṣe śiṣṭācārasyāpyucchedaprasaṅgāt;
GSP29udnyku2u:942: viśvaparigrahācca na sahasā sarvoccheda iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:947: vedā api gatānugatikatayaiva lokaiḥ parigṛhyanta iti,
GSP29udnyku2u:958: tadanantaraṃ ca punaruccheda iti sārasvatamiva srotaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:961: smarati ca bhagavānvyāso gītāsu bhagavadvacanam- “yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānirbhavati bhārata /
GSP29udnyku2u:968: sa hyatra na syāt ṛte nimittam /
GSP29udnyku2u:988: (143)tathā hi, bhūyastatra karmalāghavamiti alasāḥ- itaḥ patitānāmapyanupraveśa iti ananyagatikāḥ- bhakṣyādyaniyama iti rāgiṇaḥ- svecchayā pari(yārthapari)
GSP29udnyku2u:989: graha iti kutarkābhyāsinaḥ- pitrādikramābhāvāt pravṛttiriti pāṣaṇḍasaṃsargiṇaḥ- “ubhayorantaraṃ
GSP29udnyku2u:990: jñātvā kasya śaucaṃ vidhīyate” ityādi śravaṇādavyagratābhimāninaḥ- saptaghaṭikābhojanādisiddherjīviketi
GSP29udnyku2u:998: ato na te mahājanaparigṛgītā iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP29udnyku2u:1001: na kiñcidvinaśyatīti stimitākāśakalpe jagati kuto viśeṣāt punaḥ sargaḥ?
GSP29udnyku2u:1010: nityasya ca viṣayataḥ svarūpataścāviśeṣāditi cet- na- [ku.2.282] śarīrasaṅkṣobhaśramajanitanidrāṇāṃ
GSP29udnyku2u:1025: ta evaṃ saṃsārāṅgāreṣu pacyamānān prāṇinaḥ paśyantaḥ paramakāruṇikāḥ priyahitopadeśenānugrahīṣyanti;
GSP29udnyku2u:1028: tathā hi- atīndriyārthadarśanopāyo māvanetyabhyupagame 'pi nāsau satyameva sākṣātkāramutpādayati;
GSP29udnyku2u:1051: pratipanniśīthanidrāṇaprātaḥpratibuddhasamastopādhyāyavat anyonyasaṃvādāt kapilādiṣu samāśvāsa iti cenna- ekajanmapratisandhānavat janmāntarapratisandhāne pramāṇābhavāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:1053: na hi pūrvajanmani mātāpitrorbrāhmaṇyāttaduttaratra brāhmaṇyamiti niyamaḥ;
GSP29udnyku2u:1068: astveka eveti cet- na tarhīśvaramantareṇānyatra samāśvāsa iti /
